titles.title: From Glory To Glory He's Changing Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
From glory to glory He's changing me,
Changing me, changing me,
His likeness and image to perfect in me,
The love of God shown to the world.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's changing, changing me,
From earthly things to the Heavenlies,
His likeness and image to perfect in me,
The love of God shown to the world.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
De gloria en gloria me cambia a mí
Me cambia a mí, me cambia a mí
Jesús me cambia a mí.
Me cambia a mí, me cambia a mí
De lo terrenal a lo celestial
Su imagen perfecta que habita en mí
Mostrando al mundo su amor.
